articles.description: Zoom has introduced a new Note taking tool for users It will allow users to take notes edit texts while they are on video calls Not only that the users will also be able to share notes to the users after the meeting
articles.content: Zoom, a popular video conferencing platform, has now introduced a new feature that will allow users to create, share and edit text documents while they are on a video call. With this new feature, the… [+1823 chars]
